title: Disconnected from PVP.net
body:
only seems to happen to your game, my internet is still running fine and fast, but when i try to get into a game and champ select i get a Disconnect from PvP.net but my net is still running. and it's caused me to dodge a queue. iv'e tried to repair the client still the same thing is happening.

what other options is there.

replies.body: Who is your ISP and what is your OS?
